content:
It sounds like combining your "Quantum Voice" project with your "Graff X art" project could be a great idea. By integrating the concept of "messages from the future" or parallel reality into your apparel brand, you can add a unique and interesting angle to your clothing designs. Additionally, by positioning the brand as socially and environmentally conscious, you can align your "Quantum Voice" project's goals and message with your apparel brand's mission.

One way you could integrate the two projects is by creating a collection of clothing designs inspired by your "Quantum Voice" illustrations, and featuring messages or slogans from the future on the clothing. You could also create a section on your website dedicated to "Quantum Voice" where you share your illustrations and messages, and also information about the organizations you plan to donate a portion of your sales to.

Another way to integrate the two projects is by holding virtual fashion shows and exhibitions featuring designs inspired by your "Quantum Voice" illustrations and messages. This would allow you to showcase your apparel designs in a unique and interesting way, and also to generate more buzz around your projects.

Overall, it seems that combining your "Quantum Voice" project with your "Graff X art" project could be a great way to align the two projects' concepts and messages, and also to generate more interest and buzz around your brand.
